title: Rihanna melts as she cuddles best friend’s newborn baby boy
text:
Aunt Oh NaNa reporting for baby duty (Picture: Rihanna, Instagram)

Rihanna has taken to her aunt duties like a duck to water judging by the most adorable snaps of her cuddling her friend’s newborn baby.

The Work singer took time out of her busy schedule to visit her personal assistant and best pal Jennifer Rosales shortly after she gave birth to her second boy, Justus Joshua Davis.

It’s safe to say that RiRi is in love with the gorgeous little tot. In her latest Instagram photos, Rihanna is seen cradling the newborn in her arms while another snap shows her planting a sweet kiss on his cheek.

And frankly, it looks as though baby Justus is quite fond of Aunt Oh NaNa as he continued to sleep peacefully through the photoshoot.

Our hearts.

In an emotional Instagram post, RiRi said: ‘I’m so grateful that I was here for your first day on the playground kid!! Aunty loves you so much already. CONGRATULATIONS to the Davis fam! @jennnrosales you a beast for making this look easy. @the_aa you a champ and a super dope dad.’

Advertisement

Advertisement

She continued referring to Jen’s eldest child: ‘@aaronrodolfodavis I know you not gonna like sharing yo mama, but you get all the new toys, lil bro only gets your old ones so you good! Here’s to baby #JustusJoshuaDavis.’

RiRi then revealed her cool nickname, writing: ‘Aunty Oh NaNa x JJ.’

NaNa? We’re guessing that’s a cheeky reference to her hit 2010 single What’s My Name? You know, the part in the chorus that goes: ‘Oh na-na, what’s my name?’

Never mind…

Rihanna is known to be particularly close with Jen, who has worked with the popstar since the early days of her career, and even gave the assistant’s son the first listen of her new music earlier this year.

The We Found Love singer posted a photo of Jen’s first boy, Aaron, sitting on the soundboard in a recording studio with large headphones covering his ears.

‘Thank you @jennnrosales and @the_aa for blessing my day a lil mo,’ while Jennifer added: ‘When tia @badgalriri gives you the first listen. #newmusic.’

Perhaps RiRi is sneakily getting in practice for if and when she decides to start a family with boyfriend Hassan Jameel. The couple have been dating for more than two years and Rihanna, 31, admitted she would love to have children in the future, telling Interview magazine in June: ‘More than anything in life.’
